arts.ttl: Two Leeds goals, TWO goalie gaffes! Watford 'keeper's miserable night
arts.sum: Daniel Bachmann had a night to forget for Watford as he let a shot slip through his gloves and parried a cross into Leeds' path as the Hornets lost 2-1 at Elland Road with the goalkeeper at fault for both goals.

arts.ttl: 'Football is my life but my Leeds United team-mate didn't want to know'
arts.sum: There are people out there playing professional football who treat it like a job, a job they're exceptionally good at, but beyond playing they have no interest in watching football or what is going on beyond the training ground at other clubs. But he wouldn't watch football.

arts.ttl: 'Wasn't his evening' Tom Cleverley makes Dan Bachmann admission after Watford howlers help Leeds United
arts.sum: Leeds United shot up to joint-top of the table thanks to Watford keeper Dan Bachmann's pair of blunders, with Daniel Farke’s squad soaring to a 2-0 lead in just seven minutes. Bachmann was left red-faced and might have felt like he was shaking off a New Year’s Eve hangover during the match.

arts.ttl: AO Tanaka 'saved the world' as Leeds United nickname revealed after Farke's James Bond quip
arts.sum: Leeds United manager Daniel Farke hailed the 'outstanding' performance of Ao Tanaka in helping his side beat Watford and revealed the special nickname the squad have got for the Japanese international. The 26-year-old midfielder may have had a slow introduction at Leeds following his summer move from Fortuna Dusseldorf, but he's found a new level in recent games and was again outstanding in the 2-1 victory over the Hornets at Elland Road .

arts.ttl: Leeds Utd 2 Watford 1 - the game as it happened
arts.sum: How the action unfolded at Elland Road as Watford were beaten on the road again.

arts.ttl: Leeds United take advantage of two Watford howlers to send message to Championship rivals
arts.sum: Goals from Largie Ramazani and Brenden Aaronson inside the opening seven minutes after glaring errors from Watford keeper see Leeds win 2-1 and go joint-top of the Championship

arts.ttl: Leeds move second as two keeper blunders earns win over Watford
arts.sum: Leeds moved up to second in the Sky Bet Championship as two goalkeeping blunders by Watford's Daniel Bachmann helped them to a 2-1 win at Elland Road.

arts.ttl: Leeds United player ratings as Ramazani leads explosive start in Watford win
arts.sum: They could not have started any better with a fourth-minute opener from Largie Ramazani, which Daniel Bachmann could only parry over his own line. Should have done much better with the opening goal of the second half.

arts.ttl: Goalkeeping errors give Leeds a helping hand as they see off Watford
arts.sum: Leeds scored twice inside the opening seven minutes.

arts.ttl: Leeds United's hand may be forced in transfer deal after Largie Ramazani injury blow
arts.sum: Leeds United will sweat on the fitness of Largie Ramazani after the wide man limped out of the game with Watford at Elland Road. Firpo pulled the ball back for Ramazani on the edge of the area, and he hit it so hard Watford's goalkeeper Bachmann could only parry it over his own line before trying to claw it out.
